thread.section_title: W New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Construction View
thread.title_full: Construction View - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Victoria T
title: Construction View
text:
To say you could reach out of the window in room 1122 at shake hands with the builders is not an exaggeration. As per a previous review, the works and industrial language began on the chime of 07:00 even on the Sunday. Did mention this to reception, but advised "This is New York" - Really
Disappointed there wasn't any hot drink facilities in the room - could have mashed for the builders!
Rooms very small with you having to limbo around the television pole to get into bed.
Location good for most amenities though.
Son and his girlfriend stayed in room 1141 and both received bites. I wouldn't like to jump to conclusions, however, it does point to the room.
Would I stay here again - Probably not, especially room 1141. I'll await the standard response from the hotel manager
